Headline: #22 Clark Temporary Reroute at Clark/Addison
ShortDescription: 22 Clark buses are rerouted in both directions via Clark, Racine, Belmont, then resume their normal route on Clark due to street blockage near Clark/Addison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Clark, Racine, Belmont, then resume their normal route on Clark due to street blockage near Clark/Addison.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #152 Addison Temporary Reroute at  Clark/Addison
ShortDescription: 152 Addison buses are rerouted in both directions via Addison, Racine, Belmont, Halsted and Addison due to street blockage near Clark/Addison.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#152 Addison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Addison, Racine, Belmont, Halsted, then resume their normal route on Addison due to street blockage near Clark/Addison.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare- Bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: O'Hare- Bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier door problem at Logan Square. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare- Bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier door problem at Logan Square.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
